Random news: you know how gawker is a horrible company all around?  Two of their main editors jumped ship cause they don't think the company is going to do to well with the Hulk Hogan case.

The Hulk Hogan case is putting gawker in such a terrible spot that gawker's top brass are jumping ship before it's too late.
